description: Create inboxes and send emails. Manage threads, labels, and replies to keep conversations organized and surface messages that need attention. Automate workflows to find unreplied threads, respond, and update labels in one pass.

agentmailApiKey.description: AgentMail API key for email operations

capabilities.name: send_email
capabilities.description: Send an email from an inbox

capabilities.name: get_thread
capabilities.description: Get detailed information about a thread including all messages

capabilities.name: reply_to_message
capabilities.description: Reply to a specific message in a thread

capabilities.name: list_threads
capabilities.description: List threads in an inbox, optionally filtered by labels

capabilities.name: update_message_labels
capabilities.description: Update labels on a message (add new labels and/or remove existing ones)

capabilities.name: find_unreplied_threads
capabilities.description: Find threads that need replies by looking for specific labels

capabilities.name: process_conversational_loop
capabilities.description: Complete workflow: find unreplied thread, get details, send reply, and update labels

capabilities.name: list_messages
capabilities.description: List messages in an inbox, optionally filtered by labels

capabilities.name: get_message
capabilities.description: Get detailed information about a specific message
